reviews.review_msg: one of the nicest most helpful guys in physics.  definitely knows his material but i found the notes rather scattered.  exams were difficult to predict even though in retrospect they were well related.   the last section on quantum field theory was impossible to understand.
This course was a lot better than I thought it would be. We learned some very intresting stuff especially near the end.
Teaches a beautiful course with poise and grace.  Very very smart prof who will explain away any misunderstandings.  I only wish the homeworks had solution sets.
